item.title: [Graphics]Tools and Frameworks, Tutorials and Documents
item.description: keywords: Graphics, Shading, Shader, Rendering, Tools and Frameworks, Tutorials and Documents Blogs Tuxedolabs Blog http://blog.tuxedolabs.com/ Self Shadow https://blog.selfshadow.com/ Wojciech Jarosz https://cs.dartmouth.edu/~wjarosz/ https://github.com/wkjarosz/rendering-bib http://taichi.graphics/ https://github.com/yuanming-hu/taichi Matt Pharr https://pharr.org/matt/ Tutorials Shader Development The complete shader development course(Unity) https://shaderdev.com/ OpenGL Learning Learn OpenGL https://learnopengl.com/ Deferred Shading https://learnopengl.com/Advanced-Lighting/Deferred-Shading 3D Game Shaders For Beginners https://github.com/lettier/3d-game-shaders-for-beginners How to Start Learning Computer Graphics Programming https://erkaman.github.io/posts/beginner_computer_graphics.html Vulkan Vulkan Cookbook https://github.com/PacktPublishing/Vulkan-Cookbook API without Secrets: Introduction to Vulkan https://github.com/GameTechDev/IntroductionToVulkan
